title: גיק ג'וב: אוסף משרות היי-טק חמות במיוחד - 10 בינואר
description: גם השבוע אספנו עבורכם את המשרות החמות ביותר בהיי-טק הישראלי, על-מנת לעזור לחברינו שמחפשים משרה חדשה. בין משרות השבוע: System Analyst, Senior Backend Developer, Front End Developer ,C++ Developer ועוד
articleBody:
גם השבוע אספנו עבורכם את המשרות החמות ביותר בהיי-טק הישראלי, על-מנת לעזור לחברינו שמחפשים משרה חדשה. בין משרות השבוע: System Analyst, Senior Backend Developer, Front End Developer ,C++ Developer ועוד
 

אחת המטרות לשמן ייסדנו את גיקטיים היתה לקדם את קהילת ההייטק בארץ. בפוסט הגיקג’וב השבועי, אנחנו מפרסמים חלק מהמשרות המפורסמות בלוח משרות ההייטק החדש של גיקטיים. אם אתם מעוניינים למצוא משרות נוספות או לפרסם משרות שלכם, אתם מוזמנים לעשות זאת באמצעות לוח המשרות החדש שלנו – Geeklist. שתפו את הפוסט והעבירו הלאה כדי לעזור לחברות להפיץ את המשרות ולגולשי גיקטיים למצוא את העבודה החדשה שהם מחפשים.
 
דרישות:
תואר ראשון בהנדסה תעשייה וניהול עם התמחות במערכות מידע / תואר ראשון במערכות מידע / תואר ראשון במדעי המחשב- חובה
לפחות  שנתיים ניסיון בתפקיד מנהל/ת פרויקט בארגון גדול- חובה
ניסיון בהובלת פרוייקטי PCI–יתרון משמעותי
יכולת להוביל תהליכי גיבוש ארכיטקטורה החל מרמת התשתיות ועד ל detailed design – יתרון
ניסיון בעבודה צמודה עם צוותי תשתיות ואבטחת מידע- חובה
ניסיון קודם בארגון פיננסי-יתרון
להגשת קורות חיים לתפקיד מנהל/ת פרויקטים ומנתח מערכות Log-On
 
• Being part of a leading team to design and introduce Hadoop based solutions as the next    generation platform of the company.
• Building a Big Data solution from scratch using leading technologies like Spark/Flink/Tez
• Being a part of a POC for technology and architecture selection.
• Build a dual solution for cloud and on-prem.
• Participating in the full life cycle of the solution from design through deployment and        support including introducing the technologies and solution to all R&D.
Requirements:
• At least 2 years developing in Hadoop and Big Data technologies.
• Proven experience and deep understanding of Hadoop, Map/Reduce, HDFS and HBase/Cassandra
• Knowledge and/or experience in Hadoop and big data echo system technologies like: Hive, Pig, Spark, Cascading, Storm, MLlib, Kafka, Flume, Sqoop, Oozie.
• Analytical and problem solving skills, applied to Big Data domain
To send a CV for the position of Hadoop Developer – Optimal Plus
As a Full-stack Software Engineer for Jive (the largest and fastest growing independent vendor in the Social Business Software market aka Social CRM) you’ll play a critical role in delivering the market-leading social software platform for the enterprise.
This is no small feat, especially when dealing with enterprise customers but you will be well rewarded with the knowledge that your work will be bringing joy to millions of users who remain bound by old, clunky and stale enterprise applications.
You will be on a team that focuses on improving the wide range of existing features in Jive’s core product thus you will range throughout the application from the user interface through to the database.
In this role you will actively engage with QA, product management, customer support, product design, UI, and the rest of the development organization to achieve your goals. You¹ll have the distinct pleasure of being a hero to Jive’s customers as you improve the product based on their feedback.
Requirements:
3-4 years of software development experience with solid Java or #C expertise.
Experience in designing and implementing high performance, web based applications.
Strong knowledge of web services and RESTful apis.
Knowledge of agile development methodologies.
We are looking for a smart, highly motivated, out of the box thinker that is also a great team player.
Excellent communication skills are expected.
Bachelor ‘s degree in computer science or equivalent discipline.
PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS:
Some experience developing with Javascript, CSS, and HTML.
Experience with web technologies in the Java environment.
 To send a CV for the position of Java Developer – Full Stack – JIVE 
We are looking for an experienced and passionate individual to join our core information collection team!
Our collection technology uses advanced C++ techniques to gather and analyze low-level (kernel and user-space) information, on which we build our disruptive solution for stopping advanced cyber-threats.
Challenges in this position include writing software that can reach the depths of the operating system without resorting to writing kernel code, optimizing for extreme performance constraints while keeping a high frequency of sampling, and researching uncharted territories of the OS API.
Requirements:
• Great interpersonal skills – a must
• Mastery of C++ (proven experience focusing on system-level windows) or at least 4 years of experience in relevant software development.
• Firm understanding of the inner workings of Windows and/or Mac OS X: architecture, memory management, processes and libraries.
• The ability to independently take a feature through the entire cycle – from conception and definition, through design, implementation and testing, and until successful release to production.
• Relevant military background/BSc from a known university- an advantage.

To send a CV for the position of  C++ Developer- Cybereason 
Be a part of the server team and work on a variety of challenging SW projects  – web/windows services, back-end/front-end services, web sites, DB
Developing with Microsoft cutting edge technology – C#, .NET 4.5, WCF,ASP.
NET, MS-SQL
Work with a dynamic young group of people in a start up environment
Requirements:
B.Sc. in Computer Science/ Software Engineering – grade average of 85+
At least 3 years of proven experience
Strong knowledge in Microsoft technology in particular and other programming languages in general
Strong knowledge in DB
Strong knowledge in Client/Server architecture
Strong knowledge in web technologies

To send a CV for the position of SW Engineer-Server Team –Plus500
A successful, fast growing Internet company is looking for a System Analyst. The System Analyst Specialist has a leading role in the R&D department by understanding the business requirements and designing the systems where these requirements are implemented.
Key responsibilities:
Requirement gathering, gap analysis, writing high level and detailed specification documents, DB modeling, interfaces specification, support to R&D and QA teams, leading complex integration and customization efforts.
Requirements:
Knowledge:
Knowledge of system analysis tools and techniques,
Knowledge of DB modeling, user interfaces design and API definitions
Familiarity with internet related technologies (web services/rest protocols)
Experience:
Proven experience as a systems analyst – at least 3 years
Experience in Financial systems, e-commerce or payment processing – advantage
Experience in complex systems- mandatory
Experience as a programmer (C#, ASP.NET, JAVA) – advantage
Ability to understand source code
Experience in BPM processes – advantages
Education:
BA in systems information engineering or computer science – significant advantage
Personal skills:
General systematic view, professionalism, good personal relations, team player, responsibility, ability to work in uncertain situations under time pressure
To send a CV for the position of System Analyst –SAFECHARGE
We are looking for QA Engineers specializing in the areas of Storage, Clustering, Networking and System-integration. Candidates should have a “hands-on” approach, with a strong system-level perspective and capability of performing automated end-to-end tests for storage systems (including performance, stress, load tests etc).
Key Responsibilities:
• Design, develop and execute complex automated tests (Python-based).
• Design and implement comprehensive state-of-the-art test automation frameworks and tools to evaluate, create and maintain quality procedures.
• Define, develop and execute testing plans.
• Implement cutting edge continuous testing environment.
Requirements:
• Experience developing test automation infrastructure and/or automating tests that operate across multiple server and client machines
• Experience in analyzing large and diverse systems, understanding of QA processes and procedures.
• Background in developing test automation infrastructure and/or automating tests on a combination of Linux and Windows servers.
• Demonstrated testing experience (Test Definition & Execution) in the following fields: Integration, performance, stress, stability
• Knowledge of low-level OS user and kernel development (Linux or other) – an advantage.
• Knowledge of block-level Storage / storage networking protocols / file systems – an advantage.
• B.Sc./B.A. degree in computer science, engineering or related discipline – an advantage

To send a CV for the position of Test Automation – QA Engineer- XtremIO
Forter is looking for a talented Back-end developer to join an outstanding team, responsible for our backend infrastructure.
What it’s like to work at Forter:
We’re super-picky about who we hire, so once you’re on board, you’re working with an amazing team. But instead of boring you with words, you can check what happens when our own Itai Frenkel tries to explain why you should work with him?
Requirements:
This is you:
• A passionate software engineer who sees his profession as craftsmanship
• At least 5 years of working on your craftsmanship.
• Enthusiastic about writing tests and deploying your code to production, because you own your things!
• Experienced in planning and building scalable real-time data systems
• Experienced in Java/Python/Clojure/Scala or similar
• Enthusiastic about performant web scale server systems
• Well founded in data-structures and analytical problem solving
• A fast learner with a “Can DO” attitude
Would be very cool to have:
• Experience in building micro services based architecture
• Expertise with Amazon Web Services ecosystem
• Experience with ElasticSearch or other search engine technologies
• Experience with Spark, Storm, Samza, Hadoop, Hive, Map-Reduce or other distributed processing technologies stack
• Knowledge with Cassandra, Couchbase, MongoDB, DynamoDB or other NoSQL databases
• Self-taught from Coursera, Khan Academy or others
To send a CV for the position of Senior Backend Developer (Forter) 
IBM XIV is a high-end cloud-optimized storage system helping thousands of enterprises meet the challenge of data growth in a dynamic world. XIV continues to evolve toward a new generation and requires first-class engineers.
Join an era of innovation at one of the largest software companies in the world, where we develop a Linux based storage solution for large-scale business needs.
Job Description & Responsibilities
In this role you will work closely with IBM Manufacturing organization, IBM IT and XIV platform team. You will be part of a group of talented developers architecting, designing and developing our next generation of products.
Requirements:
IT related experience
BSc./B.A/M.Sc. in electronic engineering / computer science /computer engineering / equivalent degree – a Must
1+ years of experience with scripting languages (eg. BASH, Perl, Ruby, Python) – a Must
Willingness to travel to IBM sites worldwide to support product installations, tests and development – a Must
Familiarity with Storage / Networking protocols and concepts – An advantage
Excellent verbal, written and interpersonal communication skills
To send a CV for the position of Software Developer – XIV Platform team (IBM)
Blazemeter is a fast growing startup with an outstanding technology and top tier customers.
We are building the next-generation cloud-based performance testing solution, and looking for brilliant Web Developer who is super innovative, creative and possesses a strong UX orientation to join us
Requirements:
3+ years of experience in software development:
JavaScript and frameworks (jQuery, Backbone.js, Angular.js, Ember.js etc)
HTML/CSS
CSS and HTML preprocessors (Less, Stylus, Jade..)
Web API technologies (AJAX, REST)
JavaScript build tools (Gulp, Grunt, Webpack, Browserify..)
DB (mySQL and MongoDB)
Academic degree in Computer Sciences/Engineering
Advantages:
AWS S3 and EC2
CI – Jenkins and TravisCI
OSX and Linux ecosystem experience
Source control – Git and Github
Start-up experience and knowledge of Agile development methodologies
To send a CV for the position of Front End Developer (BlazeMeter)
